## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                 | Type                                         | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `status` | `status`  | Used to display a status of pass, fail, or unknown. If no status is provided or the provided status is not an accepted status type, the default is unknown. | `"fail" \| "pass" \| "unknown" \| undefined` | `'unknown'` |

| Slot         | Description              |
| ------------ | ------------------------ |
| `"tag-text"` | The text for the rux-tag |
